[Solving this issue](https://github.com/tidyverse/stringr/issues/266) for tidy-dev-day.


`str_c`

```{r}
str_c("Letter: ", letters)
paste("Letter: ",letters)
```

```{r}
str_c("Letter", letters, sep = ": ")
paste("Letter", letters, sep = ": ")
```

`str_conv`
`str_count`


`str_detect`

```{r}
fruit <- c("apple", "banana", "pear", "pinapple")

str_detect(fruit, "a")
grepl("a", fruit)

str_detect(fruit, "^a")
grepl("^a", fruit)

str_detect(fruit, "a$")
grepl("a$", fruit)

str_detect(fruit, "b")
grepl("b", fruit)

str_detect(fruit, "[aeiou]")
grepl("[aeiou]", fruit)
```

```{r}
## difference
str_detect("aecfg", letters)
grepl("aecfg", letters)

lapply(unlist(str_split("aecfg","")),function(x){grepl(x,letters)}) 
## TO DO: need to collaps via "or"
```
